item.title: Week 21 - 2023
item.description: cabin network cities in the future with back-to-nature movement news Biden Slams Wealthy Crypto Traders as U.S. Budget Talks Resume - Decrypt (decrypt.co) - “Let me be clear, I’m not going to agree to… a deal that protects wealthy tax cheats and crypto traders while putting food assistance at risk for nearly 1 million Americans,” he said. { #politics } The Block: Bitcoin payments app Strike integrates Tether’s USDT stablecoin (theblock.
item.content:
news

Biden Slams Wealthy Crypto Traders as U.S. Budget Talks Resume - Decrypt (decrypt.co) - “Let me be clear, I’m not going to agree to… a deal that protects wealthy tax cheats and crypto traders while putting food assistance at risk for nearly 1 million Americans,” he said. { #politics }

The Block: Bitcoin payments app Strike integrates Tether’s USDT stablecoin (theblock.co) - The move means USDT on-ramps, off-ramps and settlements are now possible within the Strike app, Tether CTO Paolo Ardoino told The Block. { #bitcoin #stablecoin }

Hong Kong Steps Up Crypto Hub Push in Contrast With Clampdowns in Asia - Bloomberg (bloomberg.com) - Retail investors can trade larger tokens in regime from June 1. City‚Äôs push for a crypto hub contrasts with Asian clampdowns { #regulation #asia }

Cryptocurrency Hardware Wallet Provider Ledger Postpones Release of Key Recovery Service After Public Criticism (coindesk.com) - After criticism from the crypto community, the firm pledged to open-source the Ledger Recover code before releasing the controversial update. { #wallet }

Multichain Token Plummets as Transactions Pile Up on Cross-chain Bridge - Decrypt (decrypt.co) - https://decrypt.co/142171/multichain-token-plummets-transactions-pile-cross-chain-bridge { #bridge }

Introducing Ark. I‚Äôm excited to publicly introduce Ark‚Ä¶ | by Burak | May, 2023 | Medium (burakkeceli.medium.com) - I‚Äôm excited to publicly introduce Ark: a second-layer protocol for making cheap, anonymous, off-chain Bitcoin payments. { #l2 #bitcoin #privacy }

The Block: Beijing releases white paper for web3 innovation and development (theblock.co) - Beijing has released a web3 white paper to promote the industry‚Äôs development. { #growth #asia }

tool

Sparrow Bitcoin Wallet - Sparrow Wallet (sparrowwallet.com) - Sparrow is a Bitcoin wallet for those who value financial self sovereignty. Sparrow‚Äôs emphasis is on security, privacy and usability. Sparrow does not hide information from you - on the contrary it attempts to provide as much detail as possible about your transactions and UTXOs, but in a way that is manageable and usable. { #bitcoin #wallet }

misc

üê¶ view tweet (twitter.com) - On 2023/05/20 at 07:25:11 UTC, Tornado Cash governance effectively ceased to exist. Through a malicious proposal, an attacker granted themselves 1,200,000 votes. As this is more than the ~700,000 legitimate votes, they now have full control. { #hack }

Interview With a Crypto Scam Investment Spammer ‚Äì Krebs on Security (krebsonsecurity.com) | [üí¨ discussion] - Social networks are constantly battling inauthentic bot accounts that send direct messages to users promoting scam cryptocurrency investment platforms. What follows is an interview with a Russian hacker responsible for a series of aggressive crypto spam campaigns that recently prompted several large Mastodon communities to temporarily halt new registrations. { #scam #bot }

Crypto giant Binance commingled customer funds and company revenue, (reuters.com) | [üí¨ discussion] - The world‚Äôs largest cryptocurrency exchange, Binance, commingled customer funds with company revenue in 2020 and 2021, in breach of U.S. financial rules that require customer money to be kept separate, three sources familiar with the matter told Reuters. { #binance #exchange #report }

Building Cabin’s Network City ‚Äî Cabin (creators.mirror.xyz) - Cabin is building a network city for our citizens, who span the globe and come together to colive and create in nature. { #network #living }

üê¶ view tweet (twitter.com)

KZG Summoning Ceremony (ceremony.ethereum.org) | [üí¨ discussion] - Add your randomness to prepare the way for EIP-4844 { #ethereum }

item.title: Week 19 - 2023
item.content:
news

U.S. Exchanges List More Than a Dozen Cryptos the SEC Says Are Illegal to Sell - WSJ (wsj.com) | [üí¨ discussion] - Number of tokens regulator has labeled as securities almost tripled in 2022 { #regulation }

üê¶ view tweet (twitter.com) - JUST IN: Bittrex #crypto exchange files for Chapter 11 bankruptcy. { #exchange }

üê¶ view tweet (twitter.com) - JUST IN: Goldman Sachs, Microsoft, Deloitte, and others partner to launch a blockchain network. { #adoption }

Jane Street, Jump Slow Crypto Trading As US Regulators Crack Down - Bloomberg (bloomberg.com) | [üí¨ discussion] - Regulatory uncertainty has made the business more difficult. Scrutiny intensified in the wake of the FTX, TerraUSD failures { #trading }

Federal Reserve’s FedNow will connect with Metal Blockchain (cointelegraph.com) - The integration will allow users to instantly convert cash to stablecoin for use in DeFi protocols. { #fed #defi }

IRS Files $44 Billion Claims Against Bankrupt FTX - Unchained Crypto (unchainedcrypto.com) | [üí¨ discussion] - The IRS‚Äô claims against the crypto exchange could take precedence over claims of other FTX creditors. { #irs #tax }

Pudgy Penguin‚Äôs $9M seed round could point to a growing NFT industry | TechCrunch (techcrunch.com) - Earlier this week, Pudgy Penguins, an NFT collection that also doubles as a web3 IP company, raised $9 million for its seed round. { #nft #raise }

tool

ContractReader (contractreader.io) - Good UI Smart contract reader (has integrations with gpt) { #gpt }

Breadcrumbs - Blockchain Investigation Tool (breadcrumbs.app) - Breadcrumbs is an open blockchain analytics platform. It offers a set of tools that empowers you to trace and monitor crypto transactions. { #analytics #tracking }

Copperx - Blockchain Payment APIs for businesses (copperx.io) - Accept payments in Bitcoin, ETH, and USDC seamlessly across various networks and wallets. Get instant settlements, send payouts and manage your business online with a unified dashboard. { #btc #eth #usdc }

wagmi: React Hooks for Ethereum ‚Äì wagmi (wagmi.sh) - wagmi is a collection of React Hooks containing everything you need to start working with Ethereum. wagmi makes it easy to “Connect Wallet,” display ENS and balance information, sign messages, interact with contracts, and much more ‚Äî all with caching, request deduplication, and persistence. { #wallet #react }

misc

üê¶ view tweet (twitter.com) | [üí¨ discussion] - Coinbase (?) had a $65 million Datadog bill per its Q1 earnings call. Wild. { #coinbase #data }

üê¶ view tweet (twitter.com) - Ordinals on BTC - BRC20 tokens explained { #bitcoin #brc20 }

The Denominator | HackerNoon (hackernoon.com) - Don’t let a dead cat bounce fool ya. The US banking system will be nationalised. The only question is will you be one of the schmucks in “The Denominator”, paying for its cleanup. Read the essay to understand the next stages of the collapse. { #macro #bitcoin }

Datadog‚Äôs $65M/year customer mystery solved (newsletter.pragmaticengineer.com) | [üí¨ discussion] - The internet has been speculating the past few days on which crypto company spent $65M on Datadog in 2022. I confirmed it was Coinbase, and here are the details of what happened. { #infra }

üê¶ view tweet (twitter.com) - üëÄbeacon chain suffers again a finality issue. As it looks now to me someone is aware of the issue and live exploiting it… { #exploit #eth }

üê¶ view tweet (twitter.com) - Binance Announces Exit from Canada { #exchange #regulation }

üê¶ view tweet (twitter.com) - Comparing modular blockchains { #blockchain #stats }

üê¶ view tweet (twitter.com) - Information is king in crypto, but how do you navigate this sea of data to gain an edge? Discover my top 10 FREE tools I use regularly to inform my decisions. { #defi #tool }
